forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 19C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 65F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Clearing late. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.
